Day Thirty.
Dream continued. Adventurers are walking through the maze, solving riddles and dying. They try and try again, wanting to survive, but they are dying in many ways. Evolution. The successful attempts are selected, there is crossing and other wave of random attempts. Evolution helps in the development of species, to establish required properties and to suppress that, which is not needed in the Labyrinth.
